description: The dataset provides climate extreme indices related to precipitation as defined by the Expert Team on Climate Change Detection and Indices (ETCCDI). The indices are provided for historical and future climate projections (SSP1-2.6, SSP2-4.5, SSP3-7.0, SSP5-8.5) included in the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6) and used in the 6th Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
title: Wet day precipitation indices
